job_description:
Project Manager – Software

Zapare Technologies is seeking an accomplished Software Project Manager to lead and deliver strategic technology initiatives. The ideal candidate will possess a strong technical foundation, exceptional leadership and communication skills, and the ability to manage cross-functional teams to deliver high-impact projects. This role demands a balance of technical expertise, project governance, stakeholder management, and operational excellence to ensure on-time, within-budget, and high-quality delivery.

Why Join Zapare Technologies

At Zapare Technologies, we are transforming healthcare and enterprise process automation through intelligent technology solutions. You will work alongside visionary leaders, drive innovation at scale, and play a key role in executing mission-critical projects that shape the company’s future. We value accountability, excellence, and leadership that inspires results.

Job Title: Project Manager – Software Location: Thrissur Infopark, Koratty Company: Zapare Technologies Pvt Ltd

Key Responsibilities

  • Strategic Leadership: Plan, initiate, and oversee large-scale software projects, ensuring alignment with business goals and organizational strategy.
  • Project Governance: Define project scope, objectives, success metrics, and delivery milestones in collaboration with executive management and key stakeholders.
  • Execution Excellence: Develop detailed project plans, manage schedules and budgets, and ensure seamless execution across all project phases.
  • Team Leadership: Lead, mentor, and motivate development teams to drive performance, accountability, and innovation.
  • Cross-Functional Coordination: Collaborate with engineering, DevOps, QA, product management, and vendor partners to achieve project outcomes.
  • Operational Oversight: Manage vendor relationships and DevOps support functions, ensuring adherence to performance and service benchmarks.
  • Risk & Compliance Management: Identify and mitigate project risks, ensuring compliance with security, quality, and governance standards.
  • Stakeholder Communication: Deliver timely and transparent project updates, progress reports, and executive summaries to leadership.
  • Continuous Improvement: Evaluate and implement best practices, tools, and methodologies to enhance project delivery and operational efficiency.

Required Skills & Qualifications

  • Experience: 8–12 years of progressive experience in software engineering and project management, with a proven record of delivering complex technology projects.
  • Technical Proficiency: Solid understanding of cloud technologies (AWS), containerization (Docker), and CI/CD frameworks.
  • Methodologies: Deep knowledge of SDLC, Agile, and hybrid project management methodologies.
  • Leadership: Demonstrated ability to lead diverse, high-performing teams and manage multiple concurrent initiatives.
  • Communication: Exceptional stakeholder management, negotiation, and presentation skills.
  • Risk & Financial Management: Expertise in budgeting, forecasting, and managing project risks.
  • Education: Bachelor’s or master’s degree in computer science, Engineering, or a related field.
  • Certifications (Preferred): PMP, PRINCE2, or Agile Certified Practitioner.

Preferred Qualifications

  • Experience in the US Healthcare domain and familiarity with HIPAA compliance standards.
  • Exposure to ISO 27001 / SOC 2 certified environments.
  • Strong understanding of cybersecurity principles and data protection best practices.
  • Experience managing projects across distributed or global teams.

For more details, please Visit; www.zaparetech.com/career

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at hr@zaparetech.com
summary: Software Project Manager needed for strategic tech initiatives. Lead cross-functional teams, manage projects, and ensure high-quality delivery using Agile and cloud technologies.

job_description:
Technical Project Manager (Senior) - Tranzmeo

Tranzmeo is seeking a Senior Technical Project Manager with 10+ years of experience to lead cross-functional engineering programs for its AI + fibre-optic sensing products. This role requires a blend of deep technical leadership (prior hands-on development experience with Python and front-end technologies is essential), program management, and coordination across product, hardware, cloud, and field operations teams.

The ideal candidate will be instrumental in translating product vision into actionable delivery plans, resolving technical impediments, and ensuring the delivery of high-quality products for industrial, mission-critical environments.

Location: Kochi (Infopark) - with periodic travel to field sites and the US office (Houston) as needed. Employment Type: Full-time, senior individual contributor or people-lead role, based on candidate profile.

Key Responsibilities:

1. Program Leadership & Delivery - Own the end-to-end delivery of product modules (e.g., T-Connect OneView features, STS enhancements, uptime monitoring). - Develop and maintain product roadmaps, release plans, milestones, risk logs, and cross-team dependency maps. - Facilitate agile ceremonies including sprint planning, PI planning, and retrospectives to ensure a predictable delivery cadence.

2. Technical Leadership & Hands-on Involvement - Utilize prior development experience (Python + front-end) to review architecture, contribute to design discussions, and make critical tradeoffs. - Collaborate with ML/data teams on model operationalization, including data pipelines, feature stores, inference latency, and model monitoring. - Coordinate hardware integration efforts for DAS/DTS devices and edge compute.

3. Stakeholder & Customer Management - Serve as the primary technical point of contact for enterprise customers in sectors like oil & gas and utilities, translating their requirements into the engineering backlog. - Prepare and deliver technical status updates and risk assessments to senior leadership and customers.

4. Quality, Reliability & Field Readiness - Define and enforce non-functional requirements such as uptime, observability, incident response protocols, and on-field diagnostics.

5. People & Process - Mentor engineering teams, conduct technical interviews, and contribute to the growth of the engineering department. - Enhance development processes to enable faster, safer releases for hardware-coupled products.

Required (Must-Have) Qualifications:

  • Experience: A minimum of 10 years of professional experience, with at least 5 years in technical/project leadership roles (e.g., Program Manager, Engineering Manager, Tech Lead).
  • Early Development Background: Significant hands-on development experience earlier in your career, specifically requiring Python and proven front-end experience (React/Angular/TypeScript or similar). Comfort with development discussions is expected.
  • Education: B.Tech / B.E. in Computer Science, Information Technology, or an equivalent degree (strict requirement).
  • Domain Familiarity: Experience with AI/ML product delivery, data engineering, or industrial IoT is strongly preferred.
  • Systems Understanding: Experience with distributed systems, real-time processing, and integrating cloud + edge components (AWS/GCP/Azure).
  • Delivery Skills: Demonstrated track record of successful Agile/Scrum delivery and experience managing complex cross-functional programs.
  • Communication: Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with experience engaging senior stakeholders and customers.

Contact: If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, please share your updated resume with athira.haridas@team.tranzmeo.com.
summary: Senior Technical Project Manager sought for AI + fibre-optic sensing products. Requires 10+ years' experience, strong Python/front-end background, and program leadership. Role involves end-to-end delivery and technical oversight.

job_description:
AI & ML Engineer (Senior)

Location: Kochi / Infopark Phase II Campus

Experience & Educational Requirements

  • Minimum of 7 years relevant experience in AI/ML engineering, data science, or related roles (industry or product-engineering).
  • Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or similar.
  • Strong preference for a B.Tech/M.Tech in CSE/IT or equivalent with good depth in data structures, algorithms, and mathematics for ML.
  • Demonstrable track record of building and deploying ML models in production (for at least 3–5 years within the 7+ years of experience).
  • Experience in product-oriented work (versus purely research) is advantageous.

Key Responsibilities

  • Lead the design, development, implementation, and optimization of machine learning, deep learning, and anomaly-detection models to power Tranzmeo’s flagship product (e.g., “T-Connect OneView”) and other AI solutions for industrial/IoT infrastructure.
  • Work end-to-end: Data ingestion, cleaning, feature engineering, model training, evaluation, deployment (edge/cloud/hybrid), and monitoring.
  • Collaborate with hardware/edge teams (e.g., fiber-optic sensing, DAS/DTS data streams) to integrate signal/sensor data pipelines, enabling real-time/near-real-time anomaly detection.
  • Build scalable architectures for AI/ML workflows, covering large volumes of streaming data, distributed processing, and possibly edge-computing constraints.
  • Mentor junior ML/data engineers, review code, establish best practices, and enforce engineering discipline (unit-testable code, model versioning, reproducibility).
  • Engage with cross-functional stakeholders (product management, domain experts in oil & gas/infrastructure, field engineering) to translate business or operational problems into ML solutions and iterate model outcomes.
  • Stay abreast of the latest developments in ML/AI (especially anomaly detection, streaming analytics, sensor-signal processing, edge ML) and bring actionable innovation into the company’s tech stack.
  • Contribute to technical architecture decisions, choosing frameworks/libraries/tools (e.g., Python ecosystem, TensorFlow/PyTorch, streaming frameworks, cloud/edge deployment).
  • Measure model performance in production, define KPIs for detection/false-alarm rates, maintain model drift tracking, and identify when to retrain/refine.
  • Document designs, maintain clear version control, ensure reproducibility of experiments, and manage the model lifecycle.
  • Assist in patenting, IP documentation, or presenting internal/external publications/workshops (given the company’s deep-tech orientation).

Required Technical Skills

  • Excellent proficiency in Python (including libraries such as NumPy, Pandas, Scikit-Learn, etc.).
  • Strong programming skills: algorithmic thinking, data structures, software engineering fundamentals, version control (Git), code reviews.
  • Deep experience in ML/AI: supervised, unsupervised, anomaly detection, time-series, streaming data, deep learning (CNNs, RNNs/LSTM, transformers if applicable).
  • Experience with sensor data, large-scale data ingestion/processing pipelines, and streaming analytics (e.g., Kafka, Spark Streaming, Flink) is a plus.
  • Knowledge of deployment of ML models: either cloud (AWS, Azure, GCP) or edge/hybrid, model serving frameworks, monitoring tools.
  • Familiarity with IoT/industrial data domains (e.g., pipelines, remote sensing, fiber-optic sensors) is highly desirable – domain knowledge will accelerate impact.
  • Strong mathematics/statistics background: probability, linear algebra, optimization, hypothesis testing, performance metrics (ROC/AUC, etc.).
  • Ability to write clean, maintainable engineering code (not just notebooks) and collaborate with software/embedded teams.
  • Good communication skills for liaising with non-ML stakeholders, explaining model outcomes, and presenting results.

Desired Additional Skills / Attributes

  • Experience with anomaly detection frameworks and techniques specific to industrial systems, remote sensing, and intrusion detection.
  • Experience with big data technologies (Hadoop/Spark, NoSQL, time-series databases) and large-scale datasets (millions of records).
  • Familiarity with edge computing constraints: model size, latency, hardware sensors, embedded systems.
  • Intellectual curiosity, startup mindset: able to work in a growing, somewhat lean organization, comfortable with ambiguity, and taking initiative. This aligns well with Tranzmeo’s culture (“entrepreneurial outlook”, “independent thinking”).
  • Leadership/mentoring ability: able to guide junior engineers and elevate team capability.
  • Strong problem-solver: able to pick up domain knowledge rapidly (oil & gas/infrastructure), translate business problems into ML pipelines.
  • Good documentation, reproducibility mindset, focus on production readiness (not just prototyping).
  • Willingness to travel or work with field data, deploy models in industrial settings if needed.

Contact Information

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at athira.haridas@team.tranzmeo.com
summary: Senior AI/ML Engineer needed for product development. Requires 7+ years of experience in ML model deployment and production systems. Focus on anomaly detection for industrial IoT.

job_description:
AI Engineer

We are looking for a talented and passionate AI Engineer to join our team. The AI Engineer will be responsible for designing, developing, and deploying AI models and algorithms to solve complex problems and drive business value. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in machine learning, deep learning, and data science, along with excellent programming skills.

Responsibilities:

  • Design, develop, and implement AI models and algorithms to solve real-world problems.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business requirements and translate them into technical solutions.
  • Conduct data analysis and preprocessing to ensure high-quality input for AI models.
  • Train, test, and validate AI models to ensure accuracy and performance.
  • Deploy AI models into production environments and monitor their performance.
  • Continuously improve AI models by incorporating new data and feedback.
  • Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in AI and machine learning technologies.
  • Document AI models, processes, and results for knowledge sharing and future reference.
  • Participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback to peers.

Requirements:

  • Proven experience as an AI Engineer, Machine Learning Engineer, or similar role.
  • Strong understanding of machine learning algorithms, deep learning frameworks, and statistical methods.
  • Experience with LLMs (GPT-4, Llama-2)
  • Experience with NLP and RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation)
  • Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, R, or Java.
  • Experience with machine learning libraries and frameworks such as TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch, or Scikit-learn.
  • Familiarity with data preprocessing, feature engineering, and data visualization techniques.
  • Familiarity with vector databases such as Pinecone and ChromaDB
  • Knowledge of cloud platforms such as AWS, Google Cloud, or Azure.
  • Experience with version control systems like Git.

job_description:
Product Manager Job Overview

We are seeking an experienced and highly motivated Product Manager to join our fast-paced team. In this role, you will oversee the entire product lifecycle — from concept and design to launch and ongoing optimization. The ideal candidate possesses strong technical understanding, business acumen, and strategic thinking skills to deliver impactful, customer-focused digital products.

Key Responsibilities

  • Manage the end-to-end product lifecycle, including ideation, requirement gathering, development, testing, launch, and maintenance.
  • Collaborate with stakeholders to define product vision, strategy, and roadmap aligned with business goals.
  • Define detailed requirements using Agile methodologies and create wireframes and supporting documentation.
  • Break down epics into user stories, establish acceptance criteria, and prioritize backlog items to meet MVP targets.
  • Act as the Product Owner during daily stand-ups, sprint planning, and reviews, ensuring alignment between business and technical teams.
  • Work closely with UX/UI designers, developers, and QA teams to deliver user-centric, high-quality features.
  • Translate business needs into technical specifications and guide implementation with engineering teams.
  • Utilize tools like Jira for backlog management, sprint planning, and progress tracking.
  • Collaborate with Marketing to prepare product collateral, sales materials, and launch communications.
  • Support Sales teams in key client meetings or product demonstrations when required.
  • Conduct market research, analyze competitor products, and identify emerging trends to refine product strategy.
  • Monitor and report on key product metrics (KPIs) to measure performance and guide future development.

Required Skills and Experience

  • 4+ years of experience as a Technical Product Owner or Product Manager in an Agile/Scrum environment.
  • Proven experience managing product lifecycles — from concept to delivery and post-launch optimization.
  • Strong analytical and technical skills with the ability to collaborate effectively with engineering teams.
  • Experience in Android platforms, Agile methodologies, and cross-functional team management.
  • Proficiency in creating and managing product roadmaps, epics, and user stories.
  • Strong understanding of market research, competitive analysis, and go-to-market planning.
  • Excellent communication and problem-solving skills, with the ability to translate business goals into actionable product initiatives.
  • Familiarity with tools such as Asana, Jira, Confluence.

Preferred Qualifications

  • Excellent command of English — both written and verbal.
  • Strong presentation, interpersonal, and stakeholder management skills.
  • Strategic thinker with a creative and results-driven approach to product development.
  • Passion for technology, innovation, and delivering superior customer experiences.

Apply Now

  • Link: https://planetmedia.in/careers/
  • Email: hr@planetmedia.in

job_description:
Data Engineer

Company: Pumex Infotech Pvt. Ltd. Location: InfoPark, Kochi Notice Period: Immediate Joiners

We are looking for a skilled Data Engineer with a strong background in PostgreSQL, SQL, and Python to join our dynamic team in Kochi. The ideal candidate will be responsible for building and optimising data pipelines, ensuring seamless data flow across systems, and supporting our analytics and product teams with reliable data solutions.

Responsibilities:

  • Design, develop, and maintain robust ETL/ELT data pipelines using tools such as Airflow or dbt.
  • Optimize PostgreSQL performance through query tuning, partitioning, indexing, JSONB handling, and PL/pgSQL scripting.
  • Develop efficient SQL and Python scripts for data transformation, automation, and workflow orchestration.
  • Work with Big Data technologies such as Apache Spark and Hadoop for large-scale data processing.
  • Implement and manage real-time data streaming using Kafka or Amazon Kinesis.
  • Ensure data reliability and versioning using Delta Lake, Apache Hudi, or Apache Iceberg frameworks.
  • Implement and maintain version control (Git) and integrate CI/CD workflows for data pipelines.
  • Ensure data accuracy, integrity, and security, while documenting data flows, architecture, and processes.

Skills Required:

  • Minimum 5+ years of experience as a Data Engineer or in a similar role.
  • Strong hands-on expertise in PostgreSQL (query optimisation, partitioning, indexing, JSONB, PL/pgSQL scripting).
  • Proficiency in SQL and Python for data manipulation, automation, and orchestration.
  • Hands-on experience with ETL/ELT frameworks such as Airflow, dbt, or equivalent tools.
  • Exposure to Big Data tools – Apache Spark, Hadoop, and streaming systems like Kafka or Kinesis.
  • Familiarity with data versioning frameworks such as Delta Lake, Hudi, or Iceberg.
  • Experience with Git and CI/CD pipelines for data engineering workflows.
  • Excellent communication, analytical, and problem-solving skills.
  • Good to have experience with Snowflake.

Educational Qualification:

  • B Tech/ M Tech/ BCA/MCA (Computer Science) or related field.

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at abi.cherian@pumexinfotech.com

job_description:
German Tutor - Remote

We are seeking an experienced German Online Tutor to join our team. As a German Tutor, you will be responsible for helping students achieve their language-learning goals through both one-on-one and group online sessions.

Duties

  • Develop and deliver engaging German language lessons for learners of varying proficiency levels.
  • Conduct both individual and group online classes to improve speaking, listening, reading, and writing skills.
  • Create and administer practice exercises and assessments to monitor student progress.
  • Provide constructive feedback and guidance to help students achieve their learning objectives.
  • Stay updated with the latest teaching methods, resources, and cultural insights related to the German language.

Roles and Responsibilities

  • Conduct live one-on-one and group sessions for students from diverse backgrounds.
  • Foster a supportive, interactive, and motivating learning environment.
  • Customize lesson plans according to the needs, goals, and pace of the learners.

Requirements

  • Minimum 2 years of teaching experience (online or offline).
  • Experience in both individual and group teaching formats.
  • Prior experience teaching international students is an advantage.
  • Good command of English for communication with students and staff.
  • Desktop/laptop with a stable broadband internet connection for live classes.
  • Willingness to work a minimum of 9 hours a day (flexible).

Why join us?

  • Work from home: Enjoy the convenience of working from the comfort of your own home. No need to commute or adhere to a strict office schedule.
  • Global reach: As an online tutor, you'll have the opportunity to interact with students from different countries. This cross-cultural experience can broaden your horizons and enhance your teaching skills.
  • Supportive academic team: Our dedicated academic team will assist you by scheduling and coordinating classes with the students. They will provide the necessary support to ensure a smooth teaching experience at TutorComp.

Contact Information Email: hr@tutorcomp.com

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at hr@tutorcomp.com.

job_title: Data Migration Expert (Oracle EBS to SAP S/4HANA)
job_description:
Data Migration Expert (Oracle EBS to SAP S/4HANA)

The Data Migration Expert will lead and support the end-to-end migration of data from Oracle E-Business Suite (EBS) to SAP S/4HANA as part of a large-scale ERP transformation. This role demands deep technical expertise in ERP data structures, hands-on experience with ETL tools (especially SAP BODS), and the ability to critically evaluate deliverables from SAP and system integrators.

Key Responsibilities

  • Strategy & Execution: Define and manage data migration scope (master, transactional, historical), contribute to planning and execution, and ensure full traceability from EBS to SAP.
  • Technical Delivery: Utilize SAP BODS and other ETL tools for data extraction, transformation, and loading; perform data profiling, cleansing, and reconciliation.
  • Quality Assurance: Review mapping logic, transformation rules, and load templates; validate test results and cutover readiness.
  • Governance & Compliance: Align migration with data governance, audit, and security standards; maintain documentation and collaborate on sign-offs.
  • Stakeholder Collaboration: Liaise with SAP, business, and technical teams to resolve issues, communicate progress, and ensure a clean, compliant transition.

Required Experience

  • 7+ years in data migration, preferably Oracle-to-SAP.
  • Proficiency in SAP BODS/Data Services and other ETL tools (e.g., CPI-DS, Informatica, Talend).
  • Strong skills in data quality management, validation, and reconciliation.
  • Excellent analytical and cross-functional communication abilities.

Key Deliverables

  • Validated data mapping and transformation documents
  • ETL/load scripts and test results
  • Reconciliation and validation reports
  • Cutover migration sign-off documentation

Location: Qatar (Full-time)

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at hr@ndimensionz.com
summary: Lead end-to-end data migration from Oracle EBS to SAP S/4HANA. Requires expertise in ETL tools, data quality, and cross-functional communication.

job_description:
Enterprise Data Architect

About the Role:

We are seeking a highly experienced Enterprise Data Architect to lead the design and implementation of enterprise-grade data platforms. This role requires a hands-on individual with a proven track record in architecting, prototyping, coding, and mentoring within complex data environments across on-premises, hybrid, and multi-cloud (AWS, Azure) landscapes.

Responsibilities:

  • Lead Technical Design: Architect and deliver enterprise-grade data platforms across on-premises, hybrid, and multi-cloud (AWS, Azure) environments, owning the technical roadmap from conception to implementation.
  • Prototype & Innovate: Actively build proof-of-concepts and prototypes to validate architectural decisions, explore new technologies, and de-risk complex implementations.
  • Code & Customize: Go beyond high-level design to write code for critical framework components and customize open-source (OSS) tools by diving into their source code to meet unique client requirements.
  • Drive Pre-Sales Engagements: Serve as the ultimate technical authority in customer meetings and on RFPs/RFIs, architecting credible, hands-on solutions that inspire client confidence.
  • Mentor & Elevate: Mentor senior engineers and architects, establishing best practices in coding, design, and deployment. Lead by example with a strong "get your hands dirty" work ethic.
  • Troubleshoot & Optimize: Act as the final escalation point for the most challenging performance, scalability, and design issues, personally leading the effort to diagnose and resolve them.
  • Adherence to Policies: To adhere to the Information Security Management policies and procedures.

Qualifications:

  • Experience Level: 15+ years of progressive, hands-on experience in data engineering and enterprise architecture.
  • Hands-On Prototyping & Development: Demonstrable, recent experience in writing production-quality code, building prototypes, and directly contributing to the codebase. Must be comfortable and proficient in coding alongside engineering teams.
  • Platform Architecture: Extensive experience designing and building large-scale, resilient data platforms from scratch across hybrid, on-premise, and multi-cloud infrastructures.
  • Multi-Cloud Expertise: Deep, hands-on architectural and implementation expertise in at least one major cloud platform (AWS or Azure preferred), with strong familiarity with a second.
  • Open-Source Mastery: Code-level expertise in at least one major open-source data framework (e.g., Spark, Flink, Trino). Proven ability to modify and extend OSS source code is a desired requirement.
  • Architectural Fluency: Mastery of batch, real-time streaming, and event-driven architectural patterns and the ability to apply them to solve complex business problems.
  • Pre-Sales Acumen: Significant experience leading the technical strategy for complex, high value RFPs and RFIs for global enterprise customers.

Soft Skills & Key Competencies:

  • Strategic & Visionary Leadership: Ability to define a long-term data strategy aligned with business goals, anticipate future trends, and inspire teams.
  • Executive Communication & Influence: Exceptional skill in articulating complex technical architectures and their business value to C-level executives, technical peers, and customers.
  • Pragmatic Problem-Solving: Creative and analytical mindset, capable of deconstructing ambiguous problems and designing elegant, effective solutions.
  • Mentorship & Team Empowerment: Genuine passion for elevating the skills of others, actively mentoring senior engineers and architects.
  • Stakeholder Management: Proven ability to build strong relationships, manage expectations, and drive consensus.
  • Resilience & Composure: Demonstrates effective leadership in high-pressure situations, tight deadlines, and critical production issues.

Contact Information:

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at padma.soorya@experionglobal.com

job_description:
Junior Business Analyst at Lean Transitions Solutions

Company: Lean Transitions Solutions Ltd (LTS) Location: Periyar Building, Technopark Phase -1, Trivandrum, 695581, India Website: http://www.LeanTransitionSolutions.com Contact Email: careers@ltslean.com Published: 14, Nov 2025 Closing Date: 20, Nov 2025

About Lean Transitions Solutions (LTS)

Founded over a decade ago with headquarters in the United Kingdom, Lean Transitions Solutions Ltd (LTS) is an ISO 9001:2015 certified company advocating Industry 4.0. LTS delivers Lean Industry 4.0 software solutions and Leadership 4.0 solutions for world-class organizations globally, including Fortune 500 companies. With global locations in India, Germany, Poland, the United States, UAE, Jordan, and Mexico, LTS is dedicated to meeting client requirements and addressing industrial and manufacturing challenges with bespoke software solutions.

At LTS, we nurture our core values: Respect for All, Integrity, Collaboration, Creativity, Inclusiveness, and Empathy.

About the Role

LTS is seeking a proactive and detail-oriented Junior Business Analyst (Fresher) to join our growing team in Trivandrum. This is an excellent opportunity for individuals passionate about analyzing business processes, collaborating with cross-functional teams, and delivering technology-driven solutions. The role involves assisting in requirement gathering, documentation, stakeholder communication, and customer success activities, providing hands-on exposure to real-world projects and fostering a strong foundation in business analysis and enterprise software implementation.

Department: Product / Projects Employment Type: Full-time

Key Learning Opportunities

  • Exposure to real-world business analysis in enterprise SaaS projects.
  • Hands-on experience with requirement management and testing processes.
  • Practical understanding of Agile methodologies and client communication.
  • Opportunity to grow into Senior Business Analyst, Product Owner, or Project Manager roles.

Key Responsibilities

1. Business Requirement Analysis: - Gather, analyze, and document business requirements in collaboration with Project Managers and clients. - Assist in preparing Business Requirement Documents (BRD), Functional Specification Documents (FSD), and User Stories. - Translate business needs into clear, actionable requirements for technical teams. - Participate in requirement workshops, sprint planning, and review meetings. - Support gap analysis between business processes and system capabilities. - Identify, analyze, and document change requests and their impacts.

2. Process Modelling & Documentation: - Map and document as-is and to-be processes using flowcharts, workflow diagrams, or tools like Visio, Lucidchart, or Draw.io. - Support process improvement initiatives and identify optimization opportunities. - Maintain traceability matrices for requirement coverage.

3. Project Coordination & Testing: - Collaborate with cross-functional teams (developers, QA testers, business stakeholders). - Assist in preparing User Acceptance Testing (UAT) scenarios, test cases, and documentation. - Coordinate UAT sessions, gather feedback, and document results. - Ensure project deliverables meet business expectations and quality standards.

4. Customer & Stakeholder Communication: - Act as a bridge between customers and internal teams, ensuring smooth communication. - Respond to client queries and support issues via email, chat, or support systems. - Maintain and update customer documentation, FAQs, and training materials. - Track, escalate, and follow up on customer requests. - Assist in creating training documents and user manuals.

5. Research & Continuous Improvement: - Conduct market research and competitor analysis. - Stay updated on business analysis methodologies, tools, and frameworks (Agile, Scrum, Lean, etc.). - Contribute to the continuous improvement of internal processes and templates.

Preferred Skills

  • Degree in Business Administration, Information Technology, Computer Science, or related field (Recently Graduated).
  • Strong analytical, problem-solving, and communication skills.
  • Good command of English (verbal and written); ability to document clearly and concisely.
  • Basic understanding of business processes, software development lifecycle (SDLC), and Agile methodologies.
  • Proficiency in MS Office tools (Excel, Word, PowerPoint) and basic familiarity with Jira, Confluence, or similar tools.
  • Ability to multitask and prioritize in a fast-paced environment.
  • Proactive attitude with a strong willingness to learn and adapt.
  • Strong passion and interest in the field.

How to Apply

Interested candidates may forward their detailed resume to careers@ltslean.com with the subject line "Junior Business Analyst".
summary: LTS seeks a Junior Business Analyst in Trivandrum to gather requirements, document processes, and communicate with stakeholders. This role offers learning opportunities in enterprise SaaS projects and Agile practices.

job_description:

Company: Reflections Info Systems (P) Ltd Location: 9A2, Carnival Technopark, Kariyavattom P.O, Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala, India, 695581 Website: http://www.reflectionsglobal.com

Brief Description

We are looking for 12+ years experienced candidates for this role.

Job Description

We are seeking an experienced Solution Architect to lead the design and implementation of a large-scale migration from SAP B2B to Optimizely Commerce Cloud. This role will serve as the technical leader, responsible for defining a scalable, secure, and future-ready architecture. The ideal candidate has deep expertise in enterprise commerce systems, cloud architecture, and system integrations. You will guide development teams, ensure best practices in solution design, and ultimately take full ownership of the architecture and development transition from the vendor.

Responsibilities include:

Architecture & Design - Define the end-to-end migration architecture from SAP B2B to Optimizely, including CMS, Commerce, and PIM integration. - Design scalable, secure, and high-performance frameworks aligned with business goals. - Establish data migration strategies for products, pricing, and customer hierarchies. - Ensure API integration between SAP, Optimizely, and other enterprise systems.

Technical Leadership - Lead and mentor development teams on best practices and coding standards. - Collaborate with Optimizely consultants and internal teams to validate feasibility and technical approach. - Drive DevOps strategy for CI/CD pipelines, containerization, and cloud deployment.

Project Ownership - Act as the technical owner of the migration project, taking over from vendor after initial phases. - Ensure alignment with enterprise security and compliance standards. - Provide technical guidance during feasibility analysis and pilot module migration.

Collaboration & Communication - Work closely with Business Analysts to translate requirements into technical solutions. - Communicate architecture decisions to stakeholders and leadership in business-friendly terms. - Support QA teams with test strategy for performance, integration, and security.

Preferred Skills

Primary Skills:

Technical Expertise - SAP B2B Architecture: Deep understanding of SAP Commerce Cloud, Back Office, and integration patterns. - B2B Platform: Hands-on experience with CMS and Commerce Cloud platforms, specifically Optimizely. - Optimizely PIM & Spire: Strong knowledge of Optimizely Product Information Management (PIM) and Spire framework for modern commerce experiences. - .NET Development: Proficient in .NET Core and ASP.NET, essential for Optimizely development. - Cloud Architecture: Strong knowledge of Azure PaaS, commonly used for hosting Optimizely solutions. - Azure Active Directory: Experience with identity and access management using Azure AD. - API Design & Integration: Skilled in RESTful services, SAP APIs, and Optimizely endpoints. - Frontend Development: Strong React expertise with CMS integration experience.

Architectural Leadership - Modern Architecture Concepts: Experience with monolithic and microservices-based systems. - Solution Architecture Design: Ability to design scalable, secure, and maintainable frameworks. - System Integration: Expertise in bridging SAP and Optimizely platforms, including middleware and data flow strategies. - Performance & Scalability: Planning for optimized performance and future growth. - Security & Compliance: Knowledge of enterprise-grade security, data protection, and regulatory standards.

Project Ownership - End-to-End Leadership: Proven ability to lead projects from blueprint to execution. - Vendor Transition: Skilled in taking over architecture and development from external consultants. - Stakeholder Communication: Capable of translating technical decisions into business value for diverse audiences.

Secondary Skills:

Technical Enhancements - GraphQL & Headless CMS Architecture: Beneficial for building modern, flexible commerce experiences. - DevOps & CI/CD Pipelines: Experience with tools like Azure DevOps or GitHub Actions for automated deployments. - Containerization: Familiarity with Docker and Kubernetes for scalable and efficient deployments.

Soft Skills:

  • Team Mentoring & Coaching: Experienced in guiding developers through complex migration phases and technical transitions.
  • Agile Methodology: Skilled in managing sprints, backlogs, and iterative delivery cycles to ensure timely and quality outcomes.
  • Analytical Thinking & Problem-Solving: Strong capability in feasibility analysis, module mapping, and resolving architectural challenges.
  • Continuous Learning Mindset: Proactively stays updated with evolving trends in SAP BTP, Optimizely, and cloud technologies.

job_description:

Company: Reflections Info Systems (P) Ltd Location: 9A2, Carnival Technopark, Kariyavattom P.O, Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala, India, 695581 Website: http://www.reflectionsglobal.com Contact Email: Careers@reflectionsinfos.com Job Published: 14, Nov 2025 Closing Date: 21, Nov 2025

Introduction

We are looking for candidates with 8+ years of experience for this role.

Job Description

We are seeking a highly skilled Full Stack Developer to lead the end-to-end migration of our B2B platform to Optimizely. This role demands deep technical expertise across front-end and back-end technologies, strong architectural understanding, and hands-on experience with ecommerce systems. The ideal candidate will drive the technical strategy, implementation, and integration efforts, ensuring a seamless transition from SAP ECC to Optimizely Commerce.

Responsibilities:

  • Lead the full lifecycle of the B2B to Optimizely migration project, from planning to deployment.
  • Develop scalable, secure, and maintainable full-stack solutions.
  • Collaborate with architects, business analysts, QA, and DevOps teams to ensure alignment and delivery.
  • Design and implement RESTful APIs for seamless integration between SAP ECC and Optimizely.
  • Ensure high performance and responsiveness of applications across browsers and devices.
  • Integrate and optimize PIM (Product Information Management) and Spire systems within the ecommerce ecosystem.
  • Implement CI/CD pipelines for automated testing and deployment using Azure DevOps or GitHub Actions.
  • Maintain documentation and provide technical leadership and mentoring to junior developers.

Preferred Skills:

Primary Skills:

Front-End (React): - React.js (Hooks, Context API): Building scalable, component-based UIs. - JavaScript (ES6+) / TypeScript: Strong scripting and typing for maintainable code. - HTML5 / CSS3 / SASS: Responsive design and layout skills. - State Management: Redux or React Query for managing complex state. - API Integration: Consuming RESTful APIs securely and efficiently. - Cross-Browser Compatibility: Ensuring consistent UI behavior across platforms.

Back-End (.NET): - .NET Core / C#: Building scalable services and APIs for Optimizely. - Entity Framework / LINQ: Data access and manipulation. - RESTful API Design: Creating secure, performant endpoints for ECC-Optimizely integration. - Authentication & Authorization: OAuth2, JWT, role-based access control. - Database Design: SQL Server or PostgreSQL schema modeling and optimization.

Architecture & Integration: - Optimizely/EPIServer Platform Knowledge: Deep understanding of CMS and Commerce architecture. - SAP ECC Data Models: Familiarity with MARA, KNA1, VBAK, etc., for integration planning. - Middleware & Integration Patterns: Experience with Azure Logic Apps, MuleSoft, or Boomi. - Microservices Architecture: Designing loosely coupled services for scalability. - CI/CD Pipelines: Azure DevOps, GitHub Actions, or Jenkins for automated deployments. - Spire & PIM Integration: Experience integrating product and pricing data into ecommerce platforms.

Business & Domain Knowledge: - Ecommerce Workflows: Product catalog, pricing, inventory, checkout. - B2B Commerce: Understanding of business customer journeys, bulk ordering, and account-based pricing.

Secondary Skills:

Front-End: - UI Frameworks: Material UI, Tailwind CSS, or Bootstrap. - Performance Optimization: Lazy loading, code splitting, caching strategies. - Accessibility (WCAG): Ensuring inclusive design.

Back-End: - GraphQL: For flexible data querying if used in Optimizely extensions. - Message Queues: RabbitMQ, Azure Service Bus for async processing. - Containerization: Docker, Kubernetes for deployment and scaling.

Integration & DevOps: - Monitoring & Logging: ELK stack, Application Insights, or Prometheus. - Security Best Practices: Data encryption, secure API design, GDPR compliance. - Test Automation Awareness: Understanding of unit, integration, and performance testing.

Business & Domain Knowledge: - SAP ECC Migration Strategy: Understanding of data extraction, transformation, and validation. - Stakeholder Communication: Translating technical decisions into business impact.

Soft Skills:

Leadership & Collaboration: - Solution Design: Translating business requirements into technical architecture. - Code Reviews & Mentorship: Guiding developers and enforcing best practices. - Agile Methodology: Working in sprints, managing backlog, and leading stand-ups.

Application Instructions:

Interested candidates may forward their detailed resumes to Careers@reflectionsinfos.com along with their notice period, current and expected CTC details.

Important Notice Regarding Fraudulent Job Offers:

Please be aware that some fraudsters are promising jobs with Reflections Info Systems for a fee. Reflections Info Systems never seeks payment for job opportunities. We communicate with candidates solely through our official website or LinkedIn. All employment-related emails are sent from our official HR email address. For any clarification or alerts regarding this matter, please contact careers@reflectionsinfos.com.

  • Understanding of malware types, detection tools, and cleanup methods
  • Good troubleshooting and problem-solving abilities

Closing Date: 30, Nov 2025 Job Published: 14, Nov 2025

Brief Description

Ferns IT Solutions is inviting applications for the position of Flutter Developer Intern to join our development team at our Trivandrum office. This internship is designed for candidates who want to build a strong foundation in mobile app development using Flutter and Dart. Selected candidates will receive structured training, guidance from experienced developers, and exposure to live project environments.

Internship Overview

  • Training Duration: 3 to 6 months. The duration may be reduced based on the candidate’s learning speed, technical capabilities, and overall performance during the training sessions.
  • Stipend: No stipend during the training period. This internship is focused on skill development and practical learning. Candidates will receive full-fledged training without any financial compensation during this phase.
  • Training Structure: Interns will work closely with our development team and will be involved in real-time projects to understand coding standards, UI/UX implementation, API integration, and overall project flow. Continuous mentorship will be provided to help them strengthen their development skills.

Post-Training Opportunity

Upon successful completion of the internship and depending on performance, candidates may receive an offer for a permanent position within the company. Performance will be evaluated based on technical improvement, consistency, discipline, teamwork, and ability to take ownership of assigned tasks.

Preferred Skills & Requirements

  • Basic understanding of Flutter, Dart, and mobile app development concepts.
  • Familiarity with UI components, state management basics, and API usage is an added advantage.
  • Candidates must bring their own laptop for the internship.
  • Must be available to work full-time from our Trivandrum office throughout the training period.
  • Passionate about learning, improving, and building a career in mobile app development.

job_description:
Marketing Coordinator

Company: Lean Transitions Solutions Location: Periyar Building, Technopark Phase -1, Trivandrum, 695581 Website: http://www.LeanTransitionSolutions.com Contact Email: careers@ltslean.com Closing Date: 20, Nov 2025 Job Published: 14, Nov 2025

About Us

Founded over a decade ago, Lean Transition Solutions Ltd (LTS) is headquartered in the United Kingdom and is an ISO 9001:2015 certified company advocating Industry 4.0. LTS delivers Lean Industry 4.0 software solutions and Leadership 4.0 solutions to world-class organizations globally, with offices in India, Germany, Poland, the United States, UAE, Jordan, and Mexico. Our dedicated team ensures client requirements are met with bespoke software solutions that address industrial and manufacturing challenges.

About the Role

We are seeking a proactive and detail-oriented Marketing Coordinator to support our global marketing and lead-generation activities. The ideal candidate will possess strong experience with HubSpot CRM (including automation and AI features) and the ability to coordinate effectively between UK and India teams. This role is responsible for managing day-to-day marketing operations, coordinating content and campaigns, utilizing automation for efficiency, and tracking performance through CRM and analytics tools.

Key Responsibilities:

1. Marketing Coordination - Support the execution of marketing plans and campaigns in collaboration with the global marketing team. - Manage and update marketing collaterals (case studies, one-pagers, capability decks, product sheets). - Coordinate social media posts, email campaigns, and digital content with internal teams. - Maintain and update marketing data, lead sources, and reports in HubSpot CRM. - Liaise with content writers, designers, and video creators to meet campaign deadlines. - Assist in tracking campaign results, lead engagement, and marketing analytics.

2. Marketing Plan Ownership & Team Coordination - Maintain and coordinate the marketing activity plan (daily, weekly, and monthly tasks). - Assign and track deliverables across SEO, content creation, digital design, and social media teams. - Support campaign planning, execution, and follow-up to ensure consistent messaging and output. - Monitor content calendars, posting schedules, and marketing priorities across regions. - Provide weekly updates on progress, blockers, and completed deliverables.

3. Market & Competitor Analysis - Conduct light market research to identify trends, audience shifts, and competitor positioning. - Support benchmarking activities to improve messaging, branding, or campaign direction. - Feed insights into campaign strategy, product positioning, and content relevance. - Track changes in digital engagement, industry events, or sector-specific opportunities.

4. Performance Tracking & CRM Reporting - Measure and report marketing KPIs such as: - Lead generation (Marketing Leads vs Sales Qualified Leads) - Campaign engagement (clicks, impressions, downloads, form fills) - Traffic sources (email, LinkedIn, website, referrals) - Track conversions and attribution using HubSpot CRM. - Share weekly or monthly dashboards with Sales and Leadership. - Optimize campaigns based on data insights and performance metrics.

5. AI & Automation - Use HubSpot workflows, sequences, and AI tools to automate campaign tasks. - Leverage tools like ChatGPT, Canva AI, Grammarly, Jasper, etc., for content support. - Improve efficiency in reporting, document creation, and CRM updates. - Support email automation, segmentation, and follow-up sequences.

Preferred Skills:

Required: - Proficiency with HubSpot CRM (marketing tools, automation, workflows). - Experience with digital content coordination and campaign execution. - Strong organizational and communication skills. - Ability to manage multiple stakeholders and deliverables. - Familiarity with Canva, Google Workspace, MS Office (Excel, PowerPoint, Docs). - Good Command in English (both verbal and written). - 2–4 years of experience in marketing coordination, campaign support, or CRM-based marketing.

Bonus / Preferred: - Knowledge of CMS, marketing automation tools, or social publishing tools. - Experience with AI content tools (ChatGPT, Jasper, Canva AI, Grammarly). - Prior experience supporting UK/Europe teams. - Bachelor's degree in marketing, Business, Communications, or equivalent.

How to Apply:

Interested candidates may forward their detailed resume to careers@ltslean.com with the subject line “Marketing Coordinator”. Please include the following information in the email content: - Current CTC: - Expected CTC: - Notice Period: - Current Location: - Total Relevant Experience: - Willingness to work at office:
summary: Marketing Coordinator needed to support global marketing and lead generation. Responsibilities include managing campaigns, content, and CRM data using HubSpot, with a focus on automation and analytics.

job_description:
Data Analyst

Company: Yarab Technologies (P) Ltd Location: Module No: 2706, 7th Floor, Yamuna building, Phase-III Campus, Technopark, Kazhakootam , 695581 Website: http://www.yrtechnologies.co.in Contact Email: jobs@yarabltd.co.uk Job Published: 14, Nov 2025 Closing Date: 21, Nov 2025

Role Overview

The Data Analyst will be responsible for analysing large datasets related to underwriting, claims, bordereaux, and financial performance, providing actionable insights to management, underwriting teams, and capacity providers. The role requires strong analytical acumen, attention to detail, and an understanding of insurance/reinsurance data flows, including exposure modelling, premium tracking, and loss ratios.

Key Responsibilities

  • Collect, clean, and validate data from multiple internal and external sources including underwriting systems, bordereaux submissions, reinsurer reports, and claims databases.
  • Develop and maintain automated dashboards and performance reports (e.g., premium income, claims ratio, renewal trends, retention metrics).
  • Perform portfolio and treaty-level analysis to identify patterns, profitability drivers, and underwriting performance by class of business.
  • Support reinsurance data submissions, risk aggregation, and exposure modelling to ensure accuracy and timeliness.
  • Work with the Finance and Underwriting teams to reconcile financial and operational data, ensuring consistency across systems.
  • Assist in quarterly MI packs, regulatory submissions, and broker or capacity provider reporting.
  • Analyse cost per lead, conversion ratios, and other distribution metrics for the MGA’s retail and commercial lines.
  • Collaborate with IT to optimise data pipelines and improve reporting automation.
  • Present findings and recommendations to senior management and board-level committees in a concise, insight-driven format.

Key Skills & Competencies

  • Strong analytical, numerical, and problem-solving skills.
  • Proficiency in SQL, Power BI / Tableau, and Excel (advanced).
  • Working knowledge of Python or R for statistical modelling or automation (preferred).
  • Understanding of insurance concepts — premium, claims, loss ratio, exposure, treaty vs. facultative, etc.
  • Familiarity with bordereaux management, regulatory reporting (FCA, Lloyd’s, or PRA) and reinsurance data structures.
  • Excellent attention to detail with the ability to manage multiple projects and deadlines.
  • Strong communication skills — able to present complex data clearly to non-technical stakeholders.

Qualifications & Experience

  • Degree in Data Science, Statistics, Finance, Actuarial Science, or a related field.
  • Minimum 2–4 years of experience as a Data Analyst in insurance, reinsurance, or MGA sectors.
  • Experience with data visualisation tools and ETL processes.
  • Familiarity with regulatory or Lloyd’s MI reporting is a plus.
summary: Seeking a Data Analyst with 2-4 years of insurance experience to analyze underwriting and claims data. Responsibilities include data validation, dashboard development, and presenting insights.

Education

job_description:
Senior Accessibility Compliance Specialist

Company: HASpaces IT & Hospitality (P) Ltd Location: Technopark Phase 1 Campus, Trivandrum, Kerala, India Website: https://www.haspaces.com Contact Email: careers@haspaces.com

Job Summary:

The Senior Accessibility Compliance Specialist will be responsible for evaluating accessibility compliance as necessary based on the applicable provincial and federal compliance laws for all Teranet applications. The role involves close collaboration with development, design, product, and infrastructure teams to deliver high quality and accurate compliance evaluations as well as reporting in a fast-paced environment. This role will support multiple Teranet lines of business by process guidance, design / construction / implementation consultations / recommendations and ongoing operations and maintenance of accessible data, information technology solutions in accordance with regulatory and WCAG compliance. This role requires working with established processes, effective test planning, execution, automation, and ongoing process improvement.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Works under broad guidance based on the interpretation of established accessibility compliance practices.
  • Consults with peer SMEs, Developers and Analysts to identify, analyze, and document violations and inconsistencies in software applications.
  • Reviews all aspects of software changes ensuring conformance to Teranet standards and regulatory compliance.
  • Designs, executes and maintains test cases for functional and non-functional testing.
  • Validates accuracy and integrity of test results and reports on testing progress.
  • Develop test plans and provide testing estimates.
  • Contribute to the evolution and growth of the accessibility compliance practices.
  • Perform accessibility tests using evaluation tools, and assistive technologies as needed.
  • Perform manual testing as needed.
  • Records results of all testing activities.
  • Provides detailed reporting as needed.
  • Accountable for estimations shared, quality of the test conducted and reporting.
  • Contribute and evolve testing strategy to measure the impact on new systems, enhancements to existing systems or the impact system releases have on the production environment. The criteria must be established in conjunction with provincial and federal regulations as applicable.
  • Facilitate requirements reviews as needed with SMEs and project’s stakeholders.
  • Identify test conditions that require data and develop clear data requirements.
  • Design, develop and maintain a set of test cases for each application evaluated. These test cases will be used to complete any regression testing which may be required. The test cases will be continually adjusted to reflect product or regulatory compliance changes.
  • Develop thorough domain knowledge of the products to be able to develop and/or review of test cases and test strategies.
  • Anticipate problems and take corrective action, escalation as needed to resolve and achieve commitments.
  • Work closely with SMEs, developers and analysts to reproduce and isolate problems as well as provide viable solution recommendations to the accessibility challenge at hand.
  • Architect, design, develop and maintain automation test suite.
  • Work closely with specialized services team automation developers to extend or review automation.
  • Conduct effectiveness evaluation periodically and share results.
  • Review of any problem tickets, which may be reported by users to determine nature of problem and possible cause.
  • Design, create, and implement manual and automated test cases.
  • Execute manual and automated test cases, recording all results and logging all defects.
  • Create and maintain automation scripts (Playwright/PowerShell/SOAPUI).

Qualifications & Preferred Skills:

  • Expert knowledge of WCAG 2.0 and 2.1 AA guidelines and requirements.
  • Expert Knowledge of WAI-ARIA authoring guidelines and best practices.
  • Expert knowledge of AARM checkpoints.
  • Expert Knowledge of PDF and web accessibility compliance evaluation techniques.
  • Proven experience working with accessible design best practices.
  • Proven experience working with web technologies (e.g., HTML, CSS, JavaScript).
  • Proven expertise using accessibility evaluation tools and frameworks (e.g., Axe, MS Accessibility Insights, WAVE, Developer Tools, Figma, Adobe Acrobat Pro etc).
  • Proven expertise using assistive technologies (e.g., JAWS, NVDA, VoiceOver etc).
  • Proven Experience with Single Page Application testing (e.g., Angular, React etc).
  • Proven expertise in testing Web Applications and Web Services.
  • Proven experience in creating and maintaining Automation scripts using PLAYWRIGHT / POWERSHELL / SOAPUI.
  • Proven experience in programming or scripting language (JavaScript, Java, Groovy Script, C#).
  • Proven experience in functional and non-functional testing.
  • Proven experience in working in a deadline-driven environment.
  • Sound Experience in the Test Life Cycle and how it fits the SDLC.
  • Sound Experience in testing methodologies and techniques (Waterfall, Agile).
  • Sound Experience with standard QA processes and tools (e.g., Jira, ALM QC etc).
  • Sound Experience in risk-based testing.
  • Working knowledge of database design, SQL and relational database systems.
  • Experience in writing PL-SQL queries.
  • Knowledge of Client / Server and Object-Oriented architecture.
  • Strong business focus.
  • Organized and methodical approach with good attention to detail.
  • Excellent written and oral communication skills.
  • Analytical ability together with strong problem-solving skills.
  • Ability to work under own initiative and with minimal supervision.
  • Ability to produce quality reports on test results, defects and testing progress.
  • Must be a team player and work well under tight deadlines.

Experience & Education:

  • Degree/Diploma in Computer Science or Equivalent, relating to accessibility or specific IT technologies (web, graphic design, applications, information, tools) or a related discipline.
  • Professional accessibility training or certification (CPACC, WAS, CPWA, ADS, CPABE, ISTQB).
  • 8+ years of sound experience as an accessibility compliance specialist.
  • 5+ years of experience in Quality Assurance with primary focus on accessibility compliance.
  • 3+ years of experience working with WCAG / AODA / AMA evaluations.
  • 2+ years of experience working in an Agile environment.

Closing Date: November 22, 2025 Job Published: November 12, 2025
summary: Senior Accessibility Compliance Specialist to evaluate application compliance with federal and provincial laws. Collaborates with cross-functional teams for high-quality evaluations and reporting.

job_description:
Enterprise Data Architect

Company: Experion Technologies (I) (P) Ltd Location: 407, 4th Floor, Thejaswini, Technopark Campus, Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala, India, 695581 Website: http://www.experionglobal.com Contact Email: padma.soorya@experionglobal.com

Closing Date: 05, Dec 2025 Job Published: 12, Nov 2025

About the Role:

Experion Technologies is seeking a highly experienced Enterprise Data Architect to lead the design and implementation of enterprise-grade data platforms. This role requires a hands-on approach, with significant experience in coding, prototyping, and troubleshooting complex data challenges. You will be instrumental in driving technical strategy, mentoring engineering teams, and ensuring the successful delivery of innovative data solutions for global enterprise clients.

Responsibilities:

  • Lead Technical Design: Architect and deliver enterprise-grade data platforms across on-premises, hybrid, and multi-cloud (AWS, Azure) environments, owning the technical roadmap from conception to implementation.
  • Prototype & Innovate: Actively build proof-of-concepts and prototypes to validate architectural decisions, explore new technologies, and de-risk complex implementations.
  • Code & Customize: Go beyond high-level design to write code for critical framework components and customize open-source (OSS) tools by diving into their source code to meet unique client requirements.
  • Drive Pre-Sales Engagements: Serve as the ultimate technical authority in customer meetings and on RFPs/RFIs, architecting credible, hands-on solutions that inspire client confidence.
  • Mentor & Elevate: Mentor senior engineers and architects, establishing best practices in coding, design, and deployment. Lead by example with a strong "get your hands dirty" work ethic.
  • Troubleshoot & Optimize: Act as the final escalation point for the most challenging performance, scalability, and design issues, personally leading the effort to diagnose and resolve them.

Qualifications:

  • Experience Level: 15+ years of progressive, hands-on experience in data engineering and enterprise architecture.
  • Hands-On Prototyping & Development: Demonstrable, recent experience in writing production-quality code, building prototypes, and directly contributing to the codebase. You must be comfortable and proficient in coding alongside engineering teams.
  • Platform Architecture: Extensive experience designing and building large-scale, resilient data platforms from scratch across hybrid, on-premise, and multi-cloud infrastructures.
  • Multi-Cloud Expertise: Deep, hands-on architectural and implementation expertise in at least one major cloud platform (AWS or Azure preferred), with strong familiarity with a second.
  • Open-Source Mastery: Code-level expertise in at least one major open-source data framework (e.g., Spark, Flink, Trino). Proven ability to modify and extend OSS source code is a desired requirement.
  • Architectural Fluency: Mastery of batch, real-time streaming, and event-driven architectural patterns and the ability to apply them to solve complex business problems.
  • Pre-Sales Acumen: Significant experience leading the technical strategy for complex, high value RFPs and RFIs for global enterprise customers.

Preferred Skills & Key Competencies:

  • Strategic & Visionary Leadership: The ability to define a long-term data strategy that aligns with business goals, anticipate future trends, and inspire teams to build towards that vision.
  • Executive Communication & Influence: Exceptional skill in articulating complex technical architectures and their business value to C-level executives, technical peers, and customers with confidence and clarity.
  • Pragmatic Problem-Solving: A creative and analytical mindset, capable of deconstructing ambiguous problems and designing elegant, effective solutions while balancing technical purity with practical business constraints.
  • Mentorship & Team Empowerment: A genuine passion for elevating the skills of others. Actively mentors senior engineers and architects, fostering a culture of technical excellence and collaborative ownership.
  • Stakeholder Management: Proven ability to build strong relationships, manage expectations, and navigate complex organizational dynamics with both clients and internal teams to drive consensus and achieve success.
  • Resilience & Composure: Demonstrates grace and effective leadership when faced with high-pressure situations, tight deadlines, and critical production issues.
summary: Lead data architecture, design, and implementation of enterprise data platforms. Requires hands-on coding, prototyping, and mentoring experience with multi-cloud and open-source technologies.

job_description:
Embedded Engineer (BMS)

Company: GENROBOTIC INNOVATIONS (P) Ltd Location: Thejaswini Building, Technopark, Trivandrum, Kerala, India, 695581 Website: http://www.genrobotics.org

Closing Date: 25, Nov 2025 Job Published: 12, Nov 2025 Contact Email: career@genrobotics.org

Job Description

We are seeking a skilled Embedded Engineer (BMS) with a strong understanding of BMS architecture, components, and safety features. The ideal candidate will possess experience in failure analysis, problem-solving, and Li-Ion battery assembly (cylindrical, pouch, and prismatic cells), along with expertise in Low Voltage (LV) and High Voltage (HV) battery system handling.

This role involves the development and integration of new processes within the New Product Development Stage (NPDS), encompassing Design for Assembly (DFA), Design for Safety (DFS), Design Verification Analysis (DVA), ergonomics, and cable routing. You will be working on critical BMS architecture elements, including State of Charge (SOC), State of Health (SOH), cell balancing, fault detection, safety controls, and protection algorithms. A deep understanding of thermal management, energy management, and life optimization algorithms is also required.

Experience with communication protocols such as RS485, Modbus, and CAN is essential. The ability to implement custom communication protocols provided by BMS manufacturers is also expected. Proficiency in preparing Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs), work instructions, and quality checklists is necessary. Familiarity with battery chemistries like NMC and LiFePO4, and their impact on BMS behavior, is required. Knowledge of functional safety standards (e.g., ISO 26262) is considered a plus.

Furthermore, the ability to integrate BMS data into higher-level systems or dashboards for monitoring and control is crucial for this position.

Responsibilities:

  • Design, develop, and test embedded software and firmware for BMS applications.
  • Integrate and configure BMS hardware, including microcontrollers, sensors, and communication interfaces (CAN, UART, SPI, I2C).
  • Implement State of Charge (SOC), State of Health (SOH), and cell balancing algorithms.
  • Collaborate with hardware engineers to design PCB layouts and perform hardware-software co-validation.
  • Work with cross-functional teams to ensure compliance with electrical, thermal, and mechanical battery requirements.
  • Develop diagnostic tools and support root-cause analysis of field issues.
  • Document software design, validation protocols, and change logs.

Qualifications & Skills:

Required Skills:

  • Solid understanding of Battery Management Systems (BMS) architecture, components, and safety features.
  • Failure analysis and problem-solving capabilities.
  • Good experience in Li-Ion battery assembly (cylindrical, pouch, prismatic cells), adhesive dispensing, electrical assembly, production engineering, and knowledge of quality checkpoints in battery assembly.
  • Knowledge of LV and HV battery system handling.
  • Experience in developing new processes and integrating them into NPDS: DFA, DFS, DVA, Ergonomics, and cable routing.
  • Experience in BMS architecture, SOC, SOH, cell balancing, fault detection, safety controls, and protection algorithms.
  • Knowledge of thermal management, energy management, and life optimization algorithms.
  • Experience in RS485/Modbus/CAN protocols for communication with BMS and peripheral devices.
  • Proficient in preparing SOPs, work instructions, and quality checklists.
  • Ability to read and implement custom communication protocols provided by BMS manufacturers.

Added Advantage:

  • Knowledge of functional safety standards (ISO 26262 or similar).

Educational Qualification:

  • B.Tech in ECE/EEE

Experience:

  • 2+ years of experience in battery management systems.

Location: Technopark, Thiruvananthapuram

To Apply: Click here to Apply
summary: Seeking an Embedded Engineer (BMS) with 2+ years of experience in BMS architecture and Li-Ion battery systems. Role involves developing processes, implementing algorithms, and ensuring safety for battery management.

job_description:
Sales Expert - Refinance Team

Company: Way Dot Com (P) Ltd Location: 4th Floor, Yamuna, Technopark Phase-III, Thiruvananthapuram, 695583 Website: http://www.way.com Contact Email: careers@way.com Application Link: https://waydot.greythr.com/hire/jobs/sales-expert Closing Date: 14, Nov 2025 Job Published: 12, Nov 2025

About Us

Way.com is America’s dominant automotive super app, serving over 10 million customers with services ranging from auto insurance and parking to EV charging. We utilize cutting-edge AI, machine learning, and data analytics to provide innovative, personalized solutions for car ownership. Recognized by Bloomberg and Andreessen Horowitz, Way.com is making car ownership easier, more affordable, and more rewarding.

Job Details

Job Title: Sales Expert Work Arrangement: On-site Employment Type: Full-time

Role Overview

We are looking for dynamic, customer-focused Sales Experts to join our Refinance Team. As the voice of our product, you will engage directly with customers, understand their needs, and guide them towards the best refinance solutions. This is a B2C sales role emphasizing communication, persuasion, and a passion for sales.

Key Responsibilities

  • Engage with potential customers via inbound and outbound calls, emails, and chats.
  • Clearly explain refinance products, features, and benefits.
  • Build trust and rapport to convert inquiries into sales.
  • Consistently achieve individual and team sales targets.
  • Maintain accurate customer interaction and transaction records in CRM systems.
  • Collaborate with Customer Support, Product, and Marketing teams for a smooth post-sale experience.
  • Stay updated on product knowledge, process updates, and industry trends.

Preferred Skills

  • Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in any discipline (preferably Business or Engineering).
  • 2–5 years of experience in B2C sales, telesales, or customer acquisition (preferably in financial products, banking, insurance, or fintech).
  • Excellent communication skills in English (verbal and written).
  • Strong persuasion and negotiation abilities.
  • Proven ability to understand customer needs and convert interest into sales.
  • Target-driven mindset with a passion for customer engagement.
  • Basic computer proficiency and experience with CRM tools.

Preferred Qualifications

  • Experience selling refinance, loan, or insurance products.
  • Exposure to US or international customer processes (voice or non-voice).

Why You Will Love Working with Us

  • Opportunity to work for the #1 Auto Super app in the US.
  • Make a meaningful impact across 10+ million users.
  • Dynamic, fast-paced, and innovation-driven work culture.
  • Clear pathways for career growth in a rapidly scaling technology company.
  • Competitive compensation.
summary: Seeking dynamic Sales Experts for Way.com's Refinance Team. Engage customers via calls and chats to drive B2C sales and achieve targets in this on-site role.

job_description:
Backend Developer – Node.js (Expert)

Xminds Infotech (P) Ltd Module no.T-4 and T-8, Thejaswini Building 7th floor, Phase 1, Technopark, Trivandrum , 695581 http://www.xminds.com

Contact Email: careers@xminds.com

Closing Date: 30,Nov 2025 Job Published: 12,Nov 2025

Brief Description

We are looking for a Backend Developer skilled in Node.js to build robust server-side applications. You will develop REST APIs, manage databases, implement secure authentication, integrate payment gateways, and work with third-party APIs.

Responsibilities

  • Develop and maintain RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express.js
  • Design and manage databases (SQL & NoSQL) and database schemas
  • Work with ORMs/ODMs like Sequelize, TypeORM, Prisma, or Mongoose
  • Implement secure authentication (JWT, OAuth)
  • Integrate payment gateways (Stripe, PayPal) and third-party APIs
  • Handle server-side business logic and data processing
  • Write clean, maintainable code and participate in code reviews

Required Skills

  • 2–5 years of experience with Node.js and Express.js
  • Experience with databases: PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQLite, MongoDB
  • Strong understanding of REST API development
  • Hands-on experience with authentication and payment integration
  • Familiarity with Git, npm/yarn, and version control

Preferred Skills

  • Experience with testing frameworks (Jest, Mocha)
  • Knowledge of web security best practices and CORS
  • Exposure to cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP)
  • Familiarity with Docker and containerization
summary: Seeking an expert Node.js Backend Developer to build robust server-side applications. Responsibilities include developing REST APIs, managing databases, and integrating various services.
